inclusion.criterion: radiotherapy treatments for a minimum of 40 Gy at the pelvic level
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group(ECOG) performance status of 0 or 1
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: previous radiotherapy treatments in the pelvic or abdominal region
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: medical history of gastro-intestinal inflammation, malabsorption syndrome or inflammatory bowel disease or coeliac disease
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: daily use of anti-diarrheal medication before radiotherapy
exclusion.label: not_met
